<h1 style="text-align:center;">Welcome to the Information Workbench&trade;</h1>
<br />
<p style="margin-left:20px;margin-right:20px;">The <a href="http://www.fluidops.com/information-workbench/" title="IWB Website / Demo / Intro Video">Information Workbench</a> is a platform for Linked Data application development. Designed as a self-service platform, the Information Workbench provides you with all the tools and features you need to quickly build your personal Linked Data applications.</p>

<div>
<div>  		
<h3 style="text-align:center;">Semantic Data Integration</h3>
<p>
<div style="text-align:center;"><img src="../images/navigation/integration.png" /></div> 
<ul>
<li>[[Admin:Import| Import]] data from the web, from your computer or another repository into the Information Workbench</li>
<li>Set up a [[Admin:Providers|data provider]] to automate the process of data extraction, conversion, and import</li>
</ul>
</p>  
</div>
</div>
</td>
<td  class="rounded-corners switch_background" style="width:32%;min-height:200px;">
<div> 
<div>         		
<h3 style="text-align:center;">Collaborative Knowledge Management</h3>
<p>
<div style="text-align:center;"><img src="../images/navigation/collaboration.png" /></div>
<ul>
<li>Create, edit and visualize data in [[Help:Wiki | wiki pages ]] using [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Formatting media wiki syntax] in a collaborative way</li>
<li>Get an overview and statistics about the available data in [[Admin:ContentOverview | content overview]]</li>
</ul>
</p>
</div>
</div>
</td>
<td  class="rounded-corners switch_background" style="width:32%;min-height:200px;">

<div> 	
<h3 style="text-align:center;">Search, Exploration and Analytics</h3>
<p>
<div style="text-align:center;"><img src="../images/navigation/analytics.png" /></div> 
<ul>
<li>Explore the data using the [[Help:Search | keyword search]] and the [[Help:SPARQLEndpoint | SPARQL endpoint]]</li>
<li>Make use of the [[Help:Widgets | widgets]] to navigate in, visualize the data and create analytic dashboards</li>
</ul>
</p>
